readable.title: 2384353160_f395e9a54b
readable.content: A man in a black fedora smiles at the camera . A man in a hat posing for a picture . An older man in a weathered fedora smiles slightly for the camera . An old man with blue eyes wears a big black hat . The man is wearing a black hat , a beige shirt and has his sunglasses hanging off the shirt .
